text: Navu nam'ma dutarannu spasta puravegalondige kaluhisiruvevu mattu janaru n'yaya palisabekendu navu avara (dutara) jotege granthavannu hagu takkadiyannu (n'yayada niyamagalannu) ilisiruvevu. Hageye navu ukkannu ilisiruvevu. Adaralli bhari sakti ide mattu janarige halavu prayojanagalive. Mattu yaru kannare kanade tanage mattu tanna dutarige neravaguvarembudannu allahanu ariyabayasuttane. Allahanantu bhari sakti saliyu prabalanu agiddane
